GSD.product_version: versions from v4.8 to before v5.15.75
GSD.description:
RDMA/rxe: Fix "kernel NULL pointer dereference" error

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.75 by commit f2f405af70e6f0419e718d23fa304798a5405c41, it was introduced in version v4.8 by commit 8700e3e7c4857d28ebaa824509934556da0b3e76. For more details please see the references link.
